title: Creating ranked 5s teams for Silver-Gold players
body:
There will be two teams and I will be a role in one of them, the other one I will coach.

Silver+ team -
Requirements: 
Silver 5-Gold 5 (not Gold 4, not Bronze 1)
Curse voice is a must
Able to take criticism and able to make practices on time.
Dedicated for tournaments

Gold+ team -
Requirements:
Gold 5-Plat 5 (not Silver 1, not Plat 4)
Curse voice is a must
Able to take criticism and able to make practices on time.
Dedicated for tournaments

Silver+ team roles available:
Top
Jungle
Mid
ADC
Support

Gold+ team roles available:
Top
Jungle
Mid
ADC

Add me in game (- Seerterror) and send me the answers to this "application" OR feel free to post it on this post.

Rank:
Role:
Reason to join (fun or competitive?):
Champ pool (Top 3):
Are you willing to extend the champ pool?:
Curse voice? (if you don't have it, then it's okay we can manage something):

Thanks everybody!


Note:
I'll be trying out a total of 2 people per role, if I have 2 people lined up for tryouts I will politely tell you that the role is taken and you will be on your way. Thanks! :)
